name: Minigame Mashup! - (Demo)
description:
GO IN FULLSCREEN

-------------------

Welcome to the Minigame Mashup Demo!

-------------------

Get a taste of what the real game will look like (partially) when it comes out.

-------------------

Here are the instructions for the minigames.

-------------------

If you are player 1, use WASD. Otherwise, use arrow keys.

Bottom Feeders:

Collect the ripe fruit. Pears give you +5, rotten gives you -1, and regular fruit gives you +1 points.

Luck of the Draw:

Pick a card. Any card! When both players pick a card, whoever has the greatest value wins that round. When a player loses 3 rounds, the game is over.

On the Move:

Move away from the boulders! You don’t want to touch them. The spawn rate will increase over time.

-------------------

Proper credit is given when you click on the sticky note icon on the main menu.

-------------------

Any bugs? Comment!
